div.pre: 204 Ios, Cyclades, 1936? Burial: late 3rd cent. B.C. (Schwabacher) Contents: c. 35 AR Alexander III Athens (4th cent.) Ios: 1 st. (hd. of Homer/inscr. as Regling, MÃ¼nze als Kunst, pl. 38, 786) Rhodes Ptolemy I Disposition: dispersed Information from W. Schwabacher (6 coins seen)
